imdb.plot outline: Coffee is for Closers dials into the mysterious world of telemarketing, where nothing is what it seems to be on the other end of the telephone-line. Hilarity ensues as the respective worlds of struggling actors, hardcore telemarketers and controversial social issues collide in a colorful landscape that parodies the Hollywood and political myths of our time.
imdb.title: Coffee Is for Closers
plot: Coffee is for Closers dials into the mysterious world of telemarketing, where nothing is what it seems to be on the other end of the telephone-line. Hilarity ensues as the respective worlds of struggling actors, hardcore telemarketers and controversial social issues collide in a colorful landscape that parodies the Hollywood and political myths of our time.::Christopher Taylor
